cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.desc: We use cookies to give you a better overall experience by saving your preferences. By clicking 'Accept', you are agreeing with the use of cookies.

about.title: About
about.desc: Hi there! I'm Guilherme Jardim and I'm a UX/UI Designer from Portugal, and I have the goal to improve the quality of my projects and broaden my skillset!

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.desc: I'm always interested in new projects! You can reach me by email or message me in LinkedIn, and I'll be more than happy to answer!
